Notes.Text:
This update for libcdio fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-18201: Fixed a double free vulnerability (bsc#1082877).

Vulnerabilities.Description: An issue was discovered in GNU libcdio before 2.0.0. There is a double free in get_cdtext_generic() in lib/driver/_cdio_generic.c.
